verses.verse: When the house was built after the captivity. An Ode by David. O SING to the Lord a new song; sing to the Lord, all ye of this land.
Sing to the Lord and bless His name; publish daily the good news of his salvation:
proclaim his glory among the nations; his wonderous works among all the tribes
That the Lord is great, and greatly to be praised; he is to be feared above all the gods;
That all the gods of the nations are demons; But as for the Lord, he made the heavens.
Honour and comeliness are before him, holiness and majesty in his temple.
Ascribe to the Lord, ye families of nations; ascribe to the Lord glory and honour
ascribe to the Lord glory to his name. Take sacrifices and come to his courts:
worship the Lord in his holy court: Let all the earth be moved at his presence.
Say among the nations, The Lord is King, for he hath renovated this World, which shall no more be shaken; he will judge peoples with righteousness.
Let the heavens rejoice and the earth exult: let the sea be moved and the fulness thereof.
Let the plains and all therein be gladdened; and let all the trees of the forest exult
before the Lord; for he is coming; for he is coming to judge the earth, he will judge the World with righteousnessâ€”and the several tribes with his truth.
